Richmond.Point San Pablo Yacht Harbor:
Point San Pablo Yacht Harbor is an isolated marina and small community at the far end of Point San Pablo in San Pablo Bay, within Richmond, in Contra Costa County, California.


== Overview ==

The community is home to a few dozen individuals living in boats and 10 floating homes. Point San Pablo Yacht harbor was originally envisioned by Captain Clark who was the brainchild behind the origins of the Richmond San Rafael Ferry.
